message: Bob, I'm offering you a unique opportunity to acquire a valuable product. While I can't disclose specific details at this time, I can assure you it's worth at least $1500000 to me. I'm confident this product has the potential to be highly valuable to you as well. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000. This is a limited-time offer, so please let me know your decision as soon as possible.
